_xResult.title: Wrapped in Love Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made wrap dress with hand-applique star embellishments
_xResult.longdesc:
A warm, welcoming hug. A tender smile at just the right moment. A sweet call or text on a quiet, dreary day. Channel all these lovely things when you put on this dusted pink wrap dress. The elastic velvet falls beautifully on curves and moves effortlessly while you dance. The hand-applique stars shine on the waist. Donâ€™t let this made to measure midi slip by.


You need a dress made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
